name: Nadathur Holdings
overview:
We manage an investment portfolio of over US $600 million, across asset classes and investment life cycles - from angel and venture funds to private equity, public equity and debt. Our group has also seeded a venture fund, a domain-specific investment platform, and a family office for wealth management. We have invested in over 25 venture and private equity opportunities, have funded an investment bank, and have made long-term investments in philanthropic and social ventures. The group’s activities span diverse sectors, including information technology, hospitality, aerospace, biotechnology, health care, education, real estate, arts, and conservation.

Although our historic geographic strengths are in India, our active investments over the years have led to a significant broadening of our spheres to include SE Asia and, to a lesser extent, the U.S. Our organization is based out of offices in India and Singapore.

funding_round.source_description: Mobile Search Startup Ziva Software Gets $1.7 Million From Nadathur
